data.actual_result: The chat jumps down by a seemingly random amount.
data.expected_result: The chat window does not jump down.
data.short_description: Adding or deleting a reaction on a message out of view causes the chat window to jump down by a varied amount if a new message is sent.
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll up to a message that's out of view (message history). - Have another user send a message while you are viewing the message history. - Try adding or removing your reaction from a message in the message history.
